instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4942: What is 820-4942? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has not sound at all
threads.message: Hello, I have 2015 a1501 with total no sound. Mac inside is as new. Where would you start checking from?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has not sound at all
threads.message: sorry mistaken model: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has not sound at all
threads.message: Is audio codec listed under the hardware profile? What happens when you plug in headphone?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has not sound at all
threads.message:
No Title

It do not detect headphones. and under hardware/audio tab there is no any device.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has not sound at all
threads.message:
Any history?
Voltages on <CAPACITOR>C6213</CAPACITOR>, <CAPACITOR>C6217</CAPACITOR>, inspect damage around <CHIP>U6201</CHIP>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has not sound at all
threads.message:
Voltages on:
<CAPACITOR>C6213</CAPACITOR> - 3.3v
<CAPACITOR>C6217</CAPACITOR> - 4.5v

around <CHIP>U6201</CHIP> is as good as new. should i reball <CHIP>U6201</CHIP>?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has not sound at all
threads.message: History? Recalling is a waste of time, at least replace it when you take it off the board.
